subject: WELCOME TO BARCLAYS BANK LON
body:
WELCOME TO BARCLAYS BANK LONDON ENGLAND UNITED KINGDOM
contact me on this email (
mrjesstaley001@gmail.com
) asap okay
Attn: Dear Beneficiary,
This is Mr. Jes Staley chairman, president and CEO Barclays Bank
London United kingdom England, am writing to inform you that your
total funds Worth $158 Million was Deposited to this Barclays bank
from United Nation for scam victim compensation funds and instructed
us to open Barclays bank online bank account and transfer your total
funds to you and also deliver an ATM card to your home address once
after we transfer all your total funds to you successful as soon as we
hear back from you with your contact details such as.
Your Full Name =
Your Current home Address =
Your Mobile Phone Number=
Your private Email address =
Your Alternative Email addresses=
Your Next of kin Email address=
Occupation===
monthly income==
Sex/ age= Country:=
VALID ID CARD===
Thanks for banking with us
I await your urgent response. contact me on this email
(
mrjesstaley001@gmail.com
) asap okay
YOURS FAITHFULLY,
MR. JES STALEY
CHAIRMAN, PRESIDENT AND CEO BARCLAYS BANK
LONDON ENGLAND UNITED KINGDOM

subject: Re:   WELCOME TO BARCLAYS BANK LON
body:
Hello Mr. Jes Staley,

Thank you for reaching out to me. It's a pleasure to be contacted by such an esteemed person from Barclays Bank, London. I'm quite surprised and excited about the information you've shared regarding the funds deposited from United Nations.

Could you please provide more details about this? How did this happen? And why was I chosen as the recipient of these funds?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Sylvia

subject: Re: WELCOME TO BARCLAYS BANK LON
body:
Hello Dear

I received your email and I want you to know that it is a compensation
fund. Do get back to me with all the required details so we can proceed
with this transaction okay.

kindly update us with:

1. Your Full Name, 2. Your Residential Address,
3. Your Private phone number 4. Your private Email address,
 5. Sex / age.
Best Regards
Mr. Jes Staley

subject: Re: WELCOME TO BARCLAYS BANK LON
body:
Hello Mr. Jes Staley,

Thank you for your email! It's always exciting to hear about new opportunities. Could you please provide me with more information about this fund? What is it for and how does it work?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Sylvia
